title: Facebook : number of followers of popular beauty brands 2020
summary: This statistic gives information on the Facebook number followers of popular COVERGIRL destination and accommodation brands in 2016 , based on millions of fans .
During this period of time , it was found that 9.8 millions of all fans were directed to number leader Bath_&_Body_Works .
The COVERGIRL website 's revenue amounted to 1.48 millions Facebook dollars .
gold: This statistic gives information on the most popular beauty brands on Facebook , ranked by number of followers on the social network . As of February 2020 , personal care brand Bath & Body Works was ranked first with close to 9.8 million Facebook followers .
